data.title: Home – Michael & Amber Chang Foundation
data.text:
About Michael Chang

Michael Chang set numerous “youngest player records,” turning pro at just 15 years of age.

Learn More

Chang Tennis Classic

The annual Michael Chang Tennis Classic is a popular USTA tennis tournament bringing people together for great competition and fun on the courts!

Learn More

Christian Sports League

The Christian Sports League is about community, sportsmanship, and leadership; building the Christian Faith through basketball and volleyball.

Learn More

Our Mission

The Michael & Amber Chang Foundation puts the Christian faith into action by doing the work of Christ thereby sharing the message of salvation, serving people in need, and giving individuals hope for a better tomorrow.

$

142

,000

Money Raised by the Michael & Amber Chang Foundation in 2018

Registration

Michael Chang Tennis Classic

The Chang Classic is more than a weekend tennis tournament, it’s a two weekend event that gives tennis players opportunities to compete, improve their tennis skills, make new friends, and be encouraged in life. The tournament is held every July in Newport Beach.

Register Now

Christian Sports League

CSL annually operates a volleyball and basketball league in the Pacific Northwest, as well as hosts a summer Spikefest Charity Grass Volleyball Tournament in August to benefit local charities and organizations.

Register Now

Our Partners

“

Great opportunity to play in a friendly but competitive environment while maintaining the goal of reaching others in Christ.

Positive environment with a community of players that are encouraging and supportive.

Friendly, organized, and fun!
